main event: A person in Daly City, California observed a peculiar object in the sky on 7/7/68 at 12:06 AM.
interesting points: The object appeared to be rather large, oblong or elongated in shape, and light gray or almost white in color.
The object was hovering in the sky and moving very slowly to the west, then suddenly accelerated at a high rate of speed and disappeared.
The observation lasted for approximately 3 minutes.
The sky was clear overhead, but there was some haze or fog over the coast and a glow in the air from city lights.
The person had been a stargazer for several years and had taken an astronomy course.
sighted object: a large, oblong or elongated, light gray or almost white object
